messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR ROBIN WALKER
messages.content: Supporting jobs and the recovery; Campaigning for local services; A strong voice for Worcester.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Years of business experience mean that Robin understands how to support local business and create jobs.
Robin has campaigned actively for local post offices, schools and hospitals and fairer funding.

issues.economy: Supporting jobs and the recovery; Years of business experience mean that Robin understands how to support local business and create jobs.
issues.education: Campaigning for local services; Robin has campaigned actively for schools and fairer funding.
issues.health: Campaigning for local services; Robin has campaigned actively for hospitals and fairer funding.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am campaigning for a better deal for Worcester, to improve local services and help families and businesses. I want everyone in Worcester to have access to the best education for their children, top quality healthcare and safe streets.

contactInformation.address: Churchill House, 15 Sansome Place, Worcester, WR1 1UA

endorsements.endorsement: We can't go on like this. We need change to put Britain back on its feet.

images.caption: Candidate Robin Walker with a group of supporters and interacting with constituents.
